snippet: Sprint Nextel will make local FM radio signals available on some of its smartphones, the first such deal with a carrier after years of pressure from the major radio broadcasters.
abstract: Sprint Nextel will make local FM radio signals available on some of its smartphones, the first such deal with a carrier after years of pressure from the major radio broadcasters.

headline.main: FM Radio on Cellphones, Long Sought by Broadcasters, Comes to Sprint
